RegexKitTemplateMatcher.h

00001 //
00002 //  RegexKitTemplateMatcher.h

00004 //  Created by Matt Gemmell on 12/05/2008.

00007 
00008 #import "MGTemplateEngine.h"
00009 //#import <RegexKit/RegexKit.h>
00010 #import "objpcre.h"
00011 
00012 /*
00013  This is an example Matcher for MGTemplateEngine, implemented using RegexKit.
00014  
00015  To use this matcher, you'll need to install RegexKit, link your target to it, and 
00016  ensure it's copied into your built application. The RegexKit documentations explains 
00017  how to do all this. Get RegexKit here:
00018  http://regexkit.sourceforge.net/
00019  
00020  Other matchers can easily be implemented using the MGTemplateEngineMatcher protocol,
00021  if you prefer to use another regex framework, or use another matching method entirely.
00022  */
00023 
00024 @interface RegexKitTemplateMatcher : NSObject <MGTemplateEngineMatcher> {
00025  MGTemplateEngine *engine;
00026  NSString *markerStart;
00027  NSString *markerEnd;
00028  NSString *exprStart;
00029  NSString *exprEnd;
00030  NSString *filterDelimiter;
00031  NSString *templateString;
00032  ObjPCRE *regex;
00033 }
00034 
00035 @property(assign) MGTemplateEngine *engine; // weak ref
00036 @property(retain) NSString *markerStart;
00037 @property(retain) NSString *markerEnd;
00038 @property(retain) NSString *exprStart;
00039 @property(retain) NSString *exprEnd;
00040 @property(retain) NSString *filterDelimiter;
00041 @property(retain) NSString *templateString;
00042 @property(retain) ObjPCRE *regex;
00043 
00044 + (RegexKitTemplateMatcher *)matcherWithTemplateEngine:(MGTemplateEngine *)theEngine;
00045 
00046 - (NSArray *)argumentsFromString:(NSString *)argString;
00047 
00048 @end
